name: Movies & TV shows
description: Almost anything except scary or non-sci-fi horror films. Disney+ and Netflix addict.

name: Music
description: Classical, soundtracks, sometimes some jazz and western.
footnote: Actually I've learned amateur classical piano for 20+ years.

name: Books
description: Mostly science fiction, fantasy with a few literature/non-fiction. I read ebooks on commute.

name: Coffee
description: A cup or two black coffee always make my day.

name: Photography
description: Mostly film photography in 35mm or 120 still films, sometimes in digital. Had shot Polaroid/instax mini instant films.

name: City sightseeing
description: I'm deeply interested in visiting and photographing historical sites. I can even give you a tour around Taipei and New Taipei City.

name: Maker projects
description: Building fun interactive physical computing devices.
